rows.label: qst702802_msg0001
rows.name:
Adel-sama! I've been waiting, mo! As a
result of Macmac's diligent intelligence
work, a new fact has been revealed, mo!

rows.label: qst702802_msg0002
rows.name:
According to my information, it
seems there are still green
barrels inside the capital, mo.

rows.label: qst702802_msg0003
rows.name:
But... I'm worried that
they're being kept in such
a conspicuous place, mo.

rows.label: qst702802_msg0004
rows.name: Everyone, please be careful, mo.

rows.label: qst702802_msg0005
rows.name:
Macmac is just one step away, mo. I've
already given the fool who tried to buy
the red pollen orbs a good slap, mo.

rows.label: qst702802_msg0006
rows.name:
I'll let you know as soon as
I find out where the fool who
tried to sell them is, mo!

rows.label: qst702802_msg0007
rows.name:
Macmac will never forgive anyone who
disturbs the peace of Iira, mo.

rows.label: qst702802_msg0008
rows.name: It's spanking time, mo!

rows.label: qst702802_msg0101
rows.name:
Adel-sama, everyone! How
is the collection of the
red pollen orbs going, mo?

rows.label: qst702802_msg0102
rows.name:
Macmac is also hard at work
investigating the fool who's
spreading the red pollen orbs, mo!

rows.label: qst702802_msg0103
rows.name:
By the time you've all collected most of
the red pollen orbs in the green barrels,
Macmac will have new information, mo!

rows.label: qst702802_msg0201
rows.name:
By the way, while I was investigating the
red pollen orbs, I heard all sorts of rumors
about Adel-sama and all of you, mo!

rows.label: qst702802_msg0202
rows.name:
They were all wonderful rumors,
so Macmac is very proud, mo!

rows.label: qst702802_msg0203
rows.name:
But Macmac wants even more
people to support the justice
Adel-sama believes in, mo!

rows.label: qst702802_msg0204
rows.name:
It wouldn't be strange if almost everyone
in Iira and Gula were fans of my beloved
Adel-sama and his companions, mo!

rows.label: qst702802_msg0205
rows.name:
Besides, the more active and famous you all
become, the less noticeable Macmac will be
while investigating, so it's a win-win, mo!

rows.label: qst702802_msg0206
rows.name:
Well then, everyone, I'm
counting on you, mo!

rows.label: qst702802_msg0301
rows.name:
Everyone, Macmac's
investigation is going to
take a little more time, mo.

rows.label: qst702802_msg0302
rows.name:
I'd like you to return to
Aulurium and help the people
with their problems, mo.

rows.label: qst702802_msg0303
rows.name:
The oasis, the shelter, the
Invidians... There should be
plenty of problems, mo.

rows.label: qst702802_msg0304
rows.name:
Macmac's deduction is that someone
in the capital is suspicious, mo...
So please, I'm counting on you, mo.
